1.title: Farm Stalker/Echo Club Spirits
1.plot: On the third season premiere of Haunted Collector, John Zaffis and his team of investigators travel to Montgomery, New York to meet with horse farm owner Mary Lu.

2.title: Cigar Bar Spirits/Child's Play
2.plot: John Zaffis and his team head to Boston to a cafe and cigar bar in the heart of the city, where abnormal occurrences have been frightening the staff and customers.

3.title: Ghost Behind Bars/Haunted Brothel
3.plot: John Zaffis and his team head to Montana to an old prison that has staff scared stiff, then to a former brothel where renovations have come to a halt due to terrifying activity.

4.title: Island of Fear/Tropical Terror
4.plot: A spirit at an Arkansas Inn is throwing guests down the stairs, while a castle in Missouri has a rather unfriendly house guest.

5.title: Emmitt House Ghosts/Shadow Intruder
5.plot: John Zaffis and his team visit the Emmitt House in Waverly, Ohio, a former hotel now being restored by Ashley Anthony and her husband. Next up, the team heads to Brighton, Michigan to help out mother and son Pam and Corey Moore, who have been besieged by harrowing activity in their home.

6.title: Spirits of Gettysburg/Headless Horseman
6.plot: On this special Civil War episode John and his team visit historic Gettysburg, Pennsylvania and Winfield, West Virginia.

7.title: Ghosts of Geneva/Fort Fear
7.plot: When visitors of Detroit's historic Fort Wayne encounter aggressive paranormal activity John and the team come to their rescue.

8.title: Shadow Boxer/Ghost Storm
8.plot: John Zaffis and his team head to Kansas City, Missouri to look into alleged paranormal activity at the Whatsoever Community Center.

9.title: Lakeside Terror/Pythian Spirits
9.plot: A spirit at an Arkansas Inn is throwing guests down the stairs, while a castle in Missouri has a rather unfriendly house guest.

10.title: Hollywood Haunting/Gold Rush Ghost
10.plot: John Zaffis and the crew fly to California to investigate a Hollywood Hills home once occupied by movie legend Orson Welles.

11.title: Seminary Spirits/Ghost Games
11.plot: John Zaffis and the crew fly to Madison, Ohio to investigate alleged paranormal activity at the sprawling Madison Seminary.

12.title: House of Pain/Antique Spirits
12.plot: John Zaffis and his team travel to Pensacola, Florida to look into alleged activity at an old Victorian house where famous socialite Wallis Simpson once lived.

1.title: Haunted Bayou/Library Ghost
1.plot: A Lake Charles, Louisiana landlord is losing tenants who've fled due to alleged paranormal phenomena - which includes shadows and the sighting of an old hag in a bedroom closet. The Public Library in Deep River, Connecticut is plagued by alleged spirits that are terrifying the staff and patrons alike. Reported activity includes sporadic chattering, shadow movements and an old typewriter that seems to type by itself.

2.title: My Mother's Ghost/Paranormal Predator
2.plot: A California woman wracked by family tragedy is experiencing unwanted visitations at night. Charlotte says she's felt a tugging on her leg, and has seen a shadow pass through her hallway. Chad is an avid hunter who's comfortable with guns and even landed a shark or two. But unexplained noises, a face in the closet, and a dragging sound are too much for Chad's girlfriend and young son.

3.title: Burning Spirits / Ghosts of the West
3.plot: The owner of a Sandia Park, NM barroom fears for the safety of her patrons and employees, due to alleged paranormal phenomena. A Cimarron, NM hotel is famous for the violent behavior of 19th Century guests like Jesse James, Buffalo Bill Cody and Black Jack Ketchum.

4.title: The Sanitarium/Firehouse Phantom
4.plot: The Sanitarium: A landlady in Stratford, Connecticut calls John and his team after her tenants report being attacked by an invisible assailant. Firehouse Phantom: John Zaffis and his team are called to investigate an alleged haunting at a firehouse museum in Pueblo, Colorado.

5.title: Uncivil Spirit / Revolutionary Ghost
5.plot: John Zaffis and his team head to Warwick, New York to visit newlyweds Frank and Valentina Muto. Since moving into the floor above their Italian villa restaurant, this couple's idyllic life has been disrupted by strange, disembodied voices, guests who are inexplicably overcome with fear, and harrowing screams in the middle of the night.

6.title: Slaughterhouse Ghosts/Supernatural Sword
6.plot: Slaughter House Ghosts: A Connecticut woman fears her horses and livelihood are at stake due to a haunting in her century-old barn. Supernatural Sword: A North Carolina man reports being tossed to the ground by unseen spirits in his rural home.

1.title: Haunted Mansion/Ghost Mill
1.plot: John Zaffis and his team head to Warsaw, Kentucky to help out Charlet Sosh who owns a 200-year-old mansion along the Ohio River with a growing paranormal presence.

2.title: Haunted Inn/Long Live the Kings
2.plot: On this episode of Haunted Collector, John Zaffis and his team head to Boonville, New York to meet with Eileen Esch, who runs a 200-year old bed and breakfast called the Hulbert House.

3.title: Haunted Rectory/Grand Midway Ghost
3.plot: John Zaffis and his team visit Tim Brazeal, a preservationist who is restoring an abandoned church rectory in Sedamsville, Ohio.

4.title: Priest Gun/Haunted Asylum
4.plot: On this episode of Haunted Collector, John Zaffis and his team visit the woodsy home of Joanie in Sawyer, Michigan. Next, the team heads to Radford, Virginia where preservationists hope to convert the former St. Alban's Mental Asylum into a museum, but are stymied by alleged paranormal phenomena.

5.title: Colonial Villa/Spirit Springs
5.plot: On this episode of Haunted Collector, John Zaffis and his team head to Warwick, New York to visit newlyweds Frank and Valentina Muto. Since moving into the floor above their Italian villa restaurant, this couple's idyllic life has been disrupted by strange, disembodied voices, guests who are inexplicably overcome with fear, and harrowing screams in the middle of the night. The team then travels to Stephenson, Virginia to investigate unexplained phenomena at Historic Jordan Springs, an event hall owned by Tonie Wallace. Tonie and her staff have spotted ghostly faces in...

6.title: Stirring the Dead/Ghost Writer
6.plot: John Zaffis and his team are off to Lorain County, Ohio to meet with homeowners Mindy and Joel. The couple has been experiencing paranormal activity ever since renovating their house.

7.title: Casino Phantom/California Nightmare
7.plot: John Zaffis investigates a Las Vegas casino where employees at Binion's Gambling Hall report being grabbed by a phantom hand and hearing "Get out!" in an abandoned section of the hotel.

8.title: Bare Bones/Octagon Haunting
8.plot: John and the team investigate an 8-sided plantation / Civil War hospital-turned-museum in Kentucky.

9.title: King's Tavern/Schuyler Lake
9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

10.title: Firestarter/Haunted Museum
10.plot: On this episode of Haunted Collector, John Zaffis and his team investigate strange paranormal claims at the Ansonia, Connecticut home of Carol Sardinha. Carol's son reports seeing a dark, impish figure lurking in his bedroom. Carol fears the sighting may be connected to three unexplained fires that have erupted at her home in recent years. Next, the team visits the Hardin County Museum in Elizabethtown, Kentucky amid reports of a wondering apparition and poltergeist activity.

11.title: Enfield Horror/Masonic Lodge
11.plot: On this episode of Haunted Collector, John Zaffis and his team travel to Enfield, Connecticut to visit the home of Jay and Elke Yaple. Since moving into their 200-year-old house, this couple has been terrified by lurking shadow figures, ghostly voices, and the ominous apparition of a man that seems to be targeting their young twin daughters. The team then heads to Elizabethtown, Kentucky to investigate strange phenomena reported at the Morrison Masonic Lodge. Tim Sanders, who runs the historic facility, says visitors regularly hear phantom footsteps throughout the ...

12.title: Island Haunting/Ghosts of Maui
12.plot: John Zaffis and his team of investigators travel to the island of Puerto Rico, where restless spirits and the paranormal appear to be thriving.

-1.title: Ghost Tavern/Terror House
-1.plot: On this episode of Haunted Collector, John Zaffis and his team visit Thom Drinkwater, tavern keeper at King's Tavern in Natchez, Mississippi. The team then travels to Schuyler Lake, New York to investigate phenomena at Marilyn Senko's home.

imdb.title: Haunted Collector
plot: John zaffis and his team go out to places where people have paranormal activity going on and try their best to figure out what was going on and stop it
